TextView.android:text: *Koh Ngai*\nIf you’re after a romantic beach holiday on a beautiful island and don’t mind spilling some cash for it, Ko Ngai is worth considering. Sitting quietly amid a scenic patch of the Andaman Sea with plentiful coral, Ngai hosts a long sliver of blondish-white sand with views to limestone karsts and the mainland. The tiny island doesn’t have much character, but it offers plenty of comfort.\n*Location* Krabi Province, Thailand
